name: Silicobra
description: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

abilities.name: Sand Spit
abilities.description: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
